subject: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello, my name is Kristalina Georgieva, 
am contacting you in regards to your 22 million dollar compensation funds that was transferred to my bank by United nation as a contract fund awarded to to you in other to take care of the orphanage and homeless people please get back to me with your current address and information where I can make this deposit to you
, thanks
Yours sincerely, Kristalina Georgieva, the director of international monitoring fund (IMF).
Contact NO: (812) 508 6718

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this million dollar fund. Could you please provide more details about this contract? How was I selected for this? And could you also explain the process of how these funds will be used to help the orphanage and homeless people?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Thank you for your response. The United Nations are awarding the good
people around the world with this sum of money to help support the people’s
in needs, like orphans, homeless people, and your email address was among
the people selected so congratulations to you, and will be looking forward
to hear from you soon.
Regards Kristalina Georgieva.

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello Kristalina Georgieva,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing initiative! I'm really flattered to be considered for such a noble cause. Could you please tell me more about how this program works? How was my email address selected and what would be the next steps in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
It’s depends to you to know how you going to manage your winnings once it
gets to you, your email was among the 10 lucky winners and the next time
is!

Note: We have three (3) payment methods as follows,

(1)>>Fund transfer via online banking system
(2)>>Payment via Certified ATM Card
(3)>>Funds transfer via MoneyGram Office

You are advised to choose and indicate how you wish your fund to be
released to you,
when contacting us with your details as requested,

To facilitate your fund transfer, you are to forward your personal
details which will includes:
Your Full Name.......................... ..............................
.......
Your Valid Phone numbers....................... ............................

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that's some exciting news! I can't believe my email was among the lucky winners. It's not every day you hear something like this.

As for the method of receiving the funds, I think I would prefer the Certified ATM Card. That seems like a convenient option for me.

However, before we proceed further, could you please provide more details about this? Like how did my email get selected and what is this winning from exactly? Also, are there any terms and conditions associated with it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Your email was selected through the Gmail database that was submitted by
the Gmail CEO and from the social security database, you are one of the
lucky winners and you will receive your funds after you comply with the
credentials and other valid details needed.

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Choose any of your preferred Company out of the 4Companies below and make
arrangement to send the Delivery cost of your preferred Company.

1) UPS Courier Service
I. Delivery fee $100
1days delivery.

2) FedEx Service
I. Delivery fee $75
2days delivery

3) DHL Service
I. Delivery fee $50
48hours delivery

4) ONLINE Banking Services
Charges $150

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for providing me with these options. I'm not very familiar with these services, could you please help me understand more about them? For instance, what are the differences between UPS Courier Service, DHL Service and ONLINE Banking Services in terms of delivery speed and reliability? 

Also, could you clarify what the delivery fee covers? Is it just for the transportation of the package or does it include other services as well?

I appreciate your assistance!

Best wishes,
Nancy

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
Hello Nancy
A DHL is a delivery company that delivers packages and items all over the
world same with UPS delivery company but they are different companies,
online banking is also good you can access your funds online!

subject: Re: Hello, my name is Kristalina G
body:
So you can choose the service you prefer and remit the fee for the delivery
company to take charge of your business.

body:

And online banking sounds convenient. Is it safe though? I mean, how do they ensure that no one else can access my funds?

Best wishes,

Everything is safe and sound here, online banking is secure and so does
others so you just need to make your own choice and then make the payment!
For your funds to be safely delivered to your home address.
